name: spo-create-sharepoint-faq-page
title: Create a basic SharePoint FAQ page
shortDescription: This script creates a basic FAQ page in SharePoint using a CSV file as the source.
longDescription: This script creates a basic FAQ page in SharePoint using a CSV file as the source. It allows you to add questions and answers with different background styles, such as gradients, images, or solid colors for strong emphasis.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
